summary: Single-vendor B2C online fashion store (mobile-first) built with Next.js/Tailwind/TypeScript frontend and Node/Express + PostgreSQL (Prisma) backend, featuring product catalog with variants/inventory, AI search & recommendations, faceted filtering, cart/checkout, auth, orders/returns, admin dashboard, payments, shipping, SEO/AI optimization, accessibility, compliance, monitoring, and CI/CD.
architectural_notes: Frontend: Next.js (React) + Tailwind CSS + TypeScript; mobile-first minimalist UI with performance targets (LCP < 2.5s, INP < 200ms, CLS < 0.1).
Backend: Node.js (Express) with PostgreSQL using Prisma ORM.
Search: Meilisearch or Algolia for AI/semantic search + typo tolerance and recommendations.
Hosting/CI: Vercel hosting with GitHub Actions CI/CD, preview environments, and rollback support.
Shipping integration via Shippo or EasyPost.
Payments: Stripe, PayPal, Razorpay; multi-currency and PCI-related requirements.
Analytics/marketing: GA4, Facebook Pixel, Google Ads.
SEO/AI optimization includes JSON-LD and llms.txt.

existing_features.title: Create a cohesive, modern, minimalist, mobile-first visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) and apply it consistently across the storefront and admin UI.
Build storefront catalog UI: home/collection listing with product cards, product detail page with variant selection (size/color/material), image gallery with zoom, and bundle display.

Implement faceted filtering and sorting on the product listing: category, brand, price range, size, color, material, and availability; keep filters in the URL so they are shareable and persist on refresh.

Implement search over the catalog with typo tolerance and lightweight personalization without external AI services: support prefix/substring matching plus edit-distance tolerance; add a simple recommendation module based on userâ€™s recent views and purchases.
Implement a persistent shopping cart with add/update/remove, saved across sessions (local persistence for guests; backend persistence for signed-in users).

Create a one-page checkout flow supporting guest and signed-in checkout: capture shipping address, contact email/phone, delivery method, and order review; place an order that decrements inventory and creates an order record.
Implement user authentication using Internet Identity and session-aware UI (sign in/out, account menu). Add role-based access control with at least: customer and admin roles.

Implement order management for customers: order history list, order detail view with line items, status timeline (e.g., placed/paid/fulfilled/shipped/delivered/cancelled/returned/refunded), and initiate return/refund requests.

Build an admin dashboard to manage products, inventory, bundles, and orders (view/update status, process return/refund requests). Include basic analytics (orders count, revenue total, top products) computed from stored data.

Add SEO and AI-search optimization primitives that do not require external hosting features: generate JSON-LD blocks for product pages (Product + Offer), and add a static llms.txt file with basic business metadata and site structure guidance.

Meet baseline accessibility requirements: keyboard navigability, visible focus states, sufficient color contrast, scalable text, and alt text for all product images (auto-generated fallbacks allowed).
Create legal/compliance pages and cookie consent UI: Privacy Policy, Terms, Refund Policy, and a cookie consent banner with preference storage in local persistence.

Improve the existing admin Products area (/admin/products) into an owner-friendly product management window that makes it fast to find products and start common actions (create, edit, update inventory) without leaving the page.
Refine the existing product create/edit form to be easier and safer for owners to use, including clearer validation feedback and protection against accidental loss of changes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Product catalog with variants (size/color/material), bundles, SKUs, and inventory tracking
AI-powered search (typo-tolerant, semantic) plus personalized recommendations
Faceted product filtering (category/brand/price/size/color/material)
Persistent cart and one-page checkout (guest + registered)
User authentication (email/password + Google/Facebook OAuth) with secure JWT sessions
Order management (history, tracking, returns/refunds) and customer support integration
Admin dashboard for product/order/user management, analytics, and content/banner management
Payments integration: Stripe + PayPal + Razorpay (multi-currency, PCI considerations)
Shipping integration (Shippo/EasyPost): real-time rates, labels, tracking, pin code restriction
SEO + AI-search optimization (JSON-LD for products/reviews/FAQ/org, llms.txt, Core Web Vitals targets)
Accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.2 AA: keyboard nav, alt text, contrast, scalable fonts, focus states)
Legal/compliance pages and consent: privacy (GDPR/CCPA/DPDPA), terms, refund policy, cookie consent; data rights flows
Monitoring & analytics: GA4 e-commerce tracking, error/performance monitoring, custom dashboards; pixels/ads integrations
Automated testing + CI/CD: unit/integration tests, GitHub Actions, Vercel deploys, preview environments, rollback support
Internationalization: multi-language support and RTL readiness
Content/copywriting support: AI-generated SEO-optimized product descriptions (multi-language) and dynamic reviews/testimonials
Security features: HTTPS, CSRF/XSS protections, RBAC, audit logs, and data encryption
Tax calculation integration (Avalara or built-in)
CRM/email marketing integration (Klaviyo or Mailchimp)

Implement backend data models and CRUD APIs for a single-vendor product catalog including: products, variants (size, color, material), bundles, SKUs, pricing, images, categories, brands, and inventory counts.
Owner-friendly product management UI: an easy-to-use window/workflow for adding and managing products (create/edit variants, images, pricing, inventory)

projectName: Single-vendor fashion storefront MVP on Internet Computer (catalog, search/filter, cart/checkout, orders, admin)
